achievement.name: Spend that Dough!
achievement.description: You've spent 5,000 gold!

achievement.name: Makin' It Rain!
achievement.description: Step 1: Hold gold in hand. Step 2: Throw gold into the air. You've spent 15,000 in gold!

achievement.name: Ballin'
achievement.description: Riding in stretch carriages, sipping wine, and attending lavish gatherings. You've spent 25,000 gold!

achievement.name: Blue Money
achievement.description: You've spent 20 tokens! Keep it coming, there's so much more in the purchase shop!

achievement.name: Blue Rain
achievement.description: See steps for Makin' it Rain, but repeat with Tokens. You've spent 50 tokens!

achievement.name: Blue Ballin'
achievement.description: No, not that type of Blue Ballin'! Get your mind out of the gutter. You've spent 100 tokens!

achievement.name: Window Shopping
achievement.task: Make your first purchase in the purchase shop.
achievement.description: Just looking around? Thanks for your first purchase!

achievement.name: Loyal Customer
achievement.task: Make 3 purchases in the purchase shop.
achievement.description: You're becoming one of our best customers! Keep coming back! You've made 3 purchases!

achievement.name: Shopping Spree
achievement.task: Make 10 purchases in the purchase shop.
achievement.description: Holy trinkets! You've made 10 purchases in our shop! You are our best customer!

achievement.name: Change is Good
achievement.description: Embrace it, feel it...ah what the heck. Change up your skills to see what works best.

achievement.name: Decisions Decisions...
achievement.description: Wow, you've changed skills 50 times. Maybe try getting another character slot?

achievement.name: Make Up Your Mind!
achievement.description: You've reached 100 skill swaps! Strategizing is an important part of this game.

achievement.name: Gearing Up
achievement.description: New skills = new ways to destroy your enemies! Enjoy.

achievement.name: Who Got Skills?
achievement.description: You're really ramping up your arsenal! Keep going and get all of them!

achievement.name: You Got Skills!
achievement.description: 40 skills bought in total! Make sure you have the correct balance of skills, though!

achievement.name: Match the Outfit
achievement.description: Don't like your accessories? Go buy more! Remember that the accessories in the shop change everyday!

achievement.name: The Wrong Pair
achievement.description: Either you can't find the right accessory, or you keep finding better ones. Either way, keep going back to the accessory shop!

achievement.name: Where Are They?
achievement.description: You really like to change up your accessories! You've swapped 50 accessories!

achievement.name: Diamonds Last Forever
achievement.description: You've bought 5 accessories!

achievement.name: Ooh! Shiny!
achievement.description: You've bought 15 accessories! Something tells me that you like jewelry?

achievement.name: Bling Bling!
achievement.description: The only thing left to buy is a diamond-studded suit! You've bought 30 accessories!

achievement.name: You're Fired!
achievement.description: I need somebody else to do the job, not you!

achievement.name: I'm Replacing You!
achievement.description: Either your character sucks, or you're changing up your strategy. Both ways let you fight better.

achievement.name: Is Anybody Any Good?
achievement.description: Obviously, you haven't found a solid team yet. Keep looking or maybe get another character slot.

achievement.name: Loyalty
achievement.description: Thanks for coming back! If you could, please leave us a review and tell others about Idonia!

achievement.name: Hooked
achievement.description: You've logged in 30 times! Thanks for your support!

achievement.name: Addicted
achievement.task: Login into Idonia 100x and get a special gift in your email.
achievement.description: You've logged in 100 times!! Look inside your email for a nice gift from us!

achievement.name: Sharpen the Steel
achievement.task: Upgrade your weapon for the first time.
achievement.description: Cast the molten metal into the mold and temper the blade.

achievement.name: Tighten the Hilt
achievement.description: So that when you strike, your grip is strong and your impact is fierce.

achievement.name: Time to Pillage
achievement.description: Weapons upgraded and grim faces alike, it is time to reap destruction.

achievement.name: Om Nom Nom...
achievement.task: Consume your first breadstick. Psst...they're in the purchase shop!
achievement.description: Your first Breadstick always tastes the best.

achievement.name: Raid the Rations
achievement.description: 5 breadsticks consumed! Be careful, carbs are your enemy.

achievement.name: What a Fat@$$
achievement.description: 10 breadsticks?!?! You know...you don't have to eat ALL OF THEM!

achievement.name: Welcome to Idonia!
achievement.description: Thanks for signing up for an account!  Welcome to the world of Idonia!
